additionalInfo.description: A free space containing any additional information related to a particular object. A data source may provide any JSON object, unrestricted by the BrAPI specification.

attribute.description: The ID which uniquely identifies this attribute within the given database server

attributeValueDbId.description: The ID which uniquely identifies this attribute value within the given database server

determinedDate.description: The date the value of this attribute was determined for a given germplasm

externalReferences.description: An array of external reference ids. These are references to this piece of data in an external system. Could be a simple string or a URI.
externalReferences.title: ExternalReferences

germplasm.description: The ID which uniquely identifies a germplasm within the given database server

value.description: The value of this attribute for a given germplasm
